title: STARTS_WITH
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string starts with any of the specified compare_strings (case-sensitive); otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: ...compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more strings to check for at the beginning of string

examples:
STARTS_WITH(Email, "sales@")
-- Returns TRUE if Email starts with "sales@"; otherwise, returns FALSE.

STARTS_WITH("Invoice-2023-001", "INV", "Invoice")
-- Returns TRUE because the string starts with "Invoice" (case-sensitive).

tips.text: An empty compare_strings always returns TRUE since every string starts with an empty string.
Punctuation and symbols are treated like letters.
